rComments: Gives a lot of feedback on essays, but doesn't use letter grades so its kind of a guessing game until the end. If you want a good grade on the essays you have to understand the books. Take notes in class when he discusses the books, it is REALLY helpful. I based one of my essays off of in class notes and it was my highest grade of the quarter.

rob is great at facilitating discussions in seminar and while theres not a lot of comments back on written work, robs very available and helpful during office hours. rob drinking game: every time he laughs at something silly he does that no one else laughs at, take a drink

Condescending stickler for rules. Makes screenings mandatory and is not accommodating for students. Lectures are dry and repetitive. Often says "we'll get to that" after being asked a question only to not get back to it. Essay grading is unnecessarily picky. Terrible teacher
